data.similar: WWW::Mechanize, LWP, Template::Extract, Encode, or just none.
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
FEAR::API is a tool that helps reduce your time creating site
    scraping scripts and help you do it in a much more elegant way.
    FEAR::API combines many strong and powerful features from various
    CPAN modules, such as LWP::UserAgent, WWW::Mechanize,
    Template::Extract, Encode, HTML::Parser, etc. and digests them into
    a deeper Zen.
